text:
Mohammadreza Abbasi (born July 27, 1996) is an Iranian Footballer Winger who currently plays for Zob Ahan.
Zob Ahan.
Abbasi was part of Zob Ahan Academy since 2010. He promoted to first team by Yahya Golmohammadi as summer 2014 with 3 years contract. He made his debut for Zob Ahan as September 4, 2014 against Saipa as a starter.
